articles.title: West Africa threatens force on Niger coup leaders, French embassy attacked - Reuters
articles.description: West African nations imposed sanctions and threatened force on Sunday if Niger's coup leaders fail to reinstate ousted President Mohammed Bazoum within a week, while supporters of the junta attacked the French embassy in Niamey.

articles.title: No cease-fire while Ukraine is on the offensive, Putin declares - POLITICO Europe

articles.content:
Vladimir Putin said he does not reject the idea of peace talks over Ukraine, but the Russian president added that there could be no cease-fire while Ukrainian forces are “on the offensive.”

articles.title: Niger coup leader warns regional and Western powers against military intervention - BBC

articles.content:
